{{dialogTitle}}
Subject Name Mathematics Chemistry Physics Biology @if (lecturesForm.get('sName')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Subject }
Class Name person @if (lecturesForm.get('class')?.hasError('required')) { Class name required }
Choose a date @if (lecturesForm.get('date')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Time schedule @if (lecturesForm.get('time')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter a valid time }
Status Confirm Cancelled @if (lecturesForm.get('status')?.hasError('required')) { Select Status }
